title: MASTERCLASS CYCLE: Various topics on Choral Music
details: Masterclasses and webinars by special guests and hosted by Director of Choral Studies, Antonio Llaca, on selected topics on choral music

title: CONFERENCE: Online Rehearsal Technique
details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. this session will be presented in Spanish

title: ONLINE FESTIVAL PERFORMANCES
details: The Choeur du Conservatoire de Musique de Gatineau under conductor Antonio Llaca will be performing online along side choirs and performers from around the world

title: CONFERENCE: Choral technique for amateur choirs
details: Workshops on vocal/choral technique for amateur intermediate to advance choirs. Including foreing language pronunciation, conducting gesture and rehearsal technique

title: CONCERT: Carleton Univerity Choirs Concerts
details: End of year choral concert by the Carleton University Choirs. Further details TBA

title: CONCERT: Coro Vivo Ottawa Concert
details: End of year choral concert by the Coro Vivo Ottawa. Further details TBA.
